query.stmt: select to_char('-1') as id,to_char('--请选择--') as name,'true' as checked from dual union all select to_char(id) as id,to_char(name) as name,'false' as checked from( select id,name,'false' as checked,rownum rn from SYS_BI_ADMIN_ORG where 1=1 and (id is null or [commorg(id)]) <#if q??> and name [like(q)] </#if> ) where rn<30
